EmailTemplate.description: Email to customer that their order refund has been processed for Saks in French
EmailTemplate.name: Case - ORC Closed (S5A French)
EmailTemplate.subject: Nous avons trait√© votre remboursement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting {!Case.Business_Unit__c}! We've submitted your credit request and it will reflect in your account within 14 days. If you need to contact us again about this issue, please click here
Your Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
All the best, Your {!Case.Business_Unit__c} Customer Service Team
